mapper.sql: id, dicItemKey, dicItemValue, dicId, parentId, MTime, CTime
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_DIC_ITEM (id, dicItemKey, dicItemValue, dicId, parentId, MTime, CTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dicitemkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicitemvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
dicItemKey,
dicItemValue,
dicId,

mapper.update:
update SYS_DIC_ITEM
dicItemKey = #{dicitemkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dicItemValue = #{dicitemvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dicId = #{dicid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_DIC_ITEM set dicItemKey = #{dicitemkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dicItemValue = #{dicitemvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dicId = #{dicid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from SYS_DIC_ITEM where dicId in (select id from SYS_DIC where name in ('CATEGORY_ONE_CODE','CATEGORY_TWO_CODE','CATEGORY_SPECIFIC_CODE'))

select
from SYS_DIC_ITEM where dicId = (select id from SYS_DIC where name = #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
